publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2759 Brian Adam: Treatment of Heroin Addiction by Diacetylmorphine Prescription—That the Parliament notes with interest the recent pilot programme for treatment of heroin addiction using pure heroin in the Netherlands; is aware of similar work in Switzerland and Australia, and calls on the Scottish Executive to consider the practicalities and possible pitfalls of such treatment’s potential application in Scotland.
